title: Check If A Parentheses String Can Be Valid
description:
A parentheses string is a non-empty string consisting only of '(' and ')'. It is valid if any of the following conditions is true:

It is ().
It can be written as AB (A concatenated with B), where A and B are valid parentheses strings.
It can be written as (A), where A is a valid parentheses string.

You are given a parentheses string s and a string locked, both of length n. locked is a binary string consisting only of '0's and '1's. For each index i of locked,

If locked[i] is '1', you cannot change s[i].
But if locked[i] is '0', you can change s[i] to either '(' or ')'.

Return true if you can make s a valid parentheses string. Otherwise, return false.
 
Example 1:


Input: s = "))()))", locked = "010100"
Output: true
Explanation: locked[1] == '1' and locked[3] == '1', so we cannot change s[1] or s[3].
We change s[0] and s[4] to '(' while leaving s[2] and s[5] unchanged to make s valid.
Example 2:

Input: s = "()()", locked = "0000"
Output: true
Explanation: We do not need to make any changes because s is already valid.

Example 3:

Input: s = ")", locked = "0"
Output: false
Explanation: locked permits us to change s[0]. 
Changing s[0] to either '(' or ')' will not make s valid.

Example 4:

Input: s = "(((())(((())", locked = "111111010111"
Output: true
Explanation: locked permits us to change s[6] and s[8]. 
We change s[6] and s[8] to ')' to make s valid.

 
Constraints:

n == s.length == locked.length
1 <= n <= 105
s[i] is either '(' or ')'.
locked[i] is either '0' or '1'.
starter_code:
class Solution:
    def canBeValid(self, s: str, locked: str) -> bool:
preamble:

from itertools import *

import math, collections, functools, itertools, bisect, heapq, string, re
check_function:
def check(candidate):
    assert candidate(s = "(((())(((())",locked = "111111010111") == True
    assert candidate(s = "()))()",locked = "010100") == True
    assert candidate(s = "()()",locked = "0000") == True
    assert candidate(s = ")",locked = "0") == False
    assert candidate(s = "()()()()()()()()",locked = "0000000000000000") == True
    assert candidate(s = ")()(()()(()()()())",locked = "10010101010101") == False
    assert candidate(s = "((((((((((((()))))))))())(((())))))",locked = "1111111111111100000000001000001001") == False
    assert candidate(s = "(((((())))))",locked = "000000000000") == True
    assert candidate(s = "((((()))))))",locked = "000111000111") == True
    assert candidate(s = "(()())",locked = "100101") == True
    assert candidate(s = ")(((((()()()()(())))))",locked = "10000100100001000010") == False
    assert candidate(s = "((()()(()))",locked = "10000000000") == False
    assert candidate(s = "(((())))()()",locked = "000010000000") == True
    assert candidate(s = "()((()))()((()))",locked = "0011110000111100") == True
    assert candidate(s = "()))(((()))",locked = "010011100") == False
    assert candidate(s = "(()())",locked = "000000") == True
    assert candidate(s = "()(()))(()(()))",locked = "100101100101") == False
    assert candidate(s = "(()(()))",locked = "00101000") == True
    assert candidate(s = "(((()))((())()))",locked = "111111010110100100") == True
    assert candidate(s = "((()()(())))",locked = "010000101001") == True
    assert candidate(s = "((((((()))))",locked = "000000000001") == True
    assert candidate(s = "(()))(",locked = "101010") == True
    assert candidate(s = "((((((((((((()))))))))))",locked = "111111111111110000000000") == False
    assert candidate(s = "(((((())))()())",locked = "010010000001000") == False
    assert candidate(s = "()(()(()(()))",locked = "010001000000") == False
    assert candidate(s = "((())())",locked = "10010010") == True
    assert candidate(s = "(()(()(()))",locked = "000000000") == False
    assert candidate(s = "((())())()",locked = "001010000001") == True
    assert candidate(s = "((((()))))((((()))))",locked = "11111111111111111111") == True
    assert candidate(s = "(((()))))()()()()",locked = "11111100000") == False
    assert candidate(s = "(((((()))))(((())())))",locked = "1111111111110101010101010101") == True
    assert candidate(s = "()()(()(()))",locked = "000001100100") == True
    assert candidate(s = "(((((()))(()(()))))()()",locked = "1111110100101000001000") == False
    assert candidate(s = "())(((()))",locked = "01100100") == False

    assert candidate(s = ")(()(()))",locked = "0000000") == False
    assert candidate(s = "((((((()))))))",locked = "01010101010101") == True
    assert candidate(s = "(((())))(((())))",locked = "1111111111111111") == True
    assert candidate(s = "())(()",locked = "001010") == True
    assert candidate(s = "(((())))",locked = "11111111") == True
    assert candidate(s = "((()))",locked = "000000") == True
    assert candidate(s = ")(((((()(()))())(((()))))",locked = "11100101001001001001") == False
    assert candidate(s = "((())()(()))",locked = "110101001101") == True
    assert candidate(s = "(((((())))))",locked = "111111100001") == True
    assert candidate(s = "(()(()(()(()(()))))",locked = "01001010100010") == False
    assert candidate(s = "((())()(()))",locked = "101010101010") == True
    assert candidate(s = "((((((((()))))))",locked = "000000000000000001") == True
    assert candidate(s = "((()(())))",locked = "110100110110") == True
    assert candidate(s = "(()(()(()))(()(()))",locked = "01010101010101") == False

    assert candidate(s = "(((((()))(()(()))(()))())",locked = "1111110100101010010010101001") == False

    assert candidate(s = ")()(()(()))(",locked = "010101010100") == True
    assert candidate(s = "()()()()()()()()()()",locked = "00000000000000000000") == True
